original_text: You go up to the tops of high hills, and you lie down there to have sex. You go there to offer sacrifices to your gods. You go up to the tops of high hills,
korean_text: 네가 높고 높은 산 위에 네 침상을 베풀었고 네가 또 거기에 올라가서 제사를 드렸으며

sentences.original_text: You go up to the tops of high hills,
and you lie down there to have sex.
You go there to offer sacrifices to your gods.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그곳에 가서 너의 신들에게 제물을 바친다.

sentences.original_text: You go up to the tops of high hills,
